name: Disco Inferno (finfin)
description:
Disco Inferno is a game made for the vibeocide gamejam, under the theme "second chances".

You play as a punk who found himself in hell, eager to do anything for a second chance in his short life. 

The first part of the game is a parkour section, with a diverse set of mechanics. Following the parkour there are two minigames the player has to complete, but we won't spoil anything!

The game is a short playthrough overall, spanning from ten to twenty minutes. But there are quite a few things we wish to add,  so keep your eyes peeled!

WARNING: As of right now, this game is submitted for gamejam voting, therefore making it impossible to edit for the next month. We are aware, and have noticed the few bugs present, and will upload a bug-free version as soon as the gamejam is over. Until then, maybe add to your list for later? We also have a few features to add in mind, such as multiplayer and multiple endings. Thanks for understanding...
